channel.name: HL7: Process immediately
channel.description:
This channel shows how one can make an HL7 listener interface which does not queue messages.
The message processing needs to happen inside the LLP translator script before the ACKnowledgement message is sent.
http://help.interfaceware.com/v6/hl7-process-immediately

from_llp_listener.ack_commit_comment: Import Translators: Next import of channels from Julian.

message_filter.translator_commit_comment: Import Translators: Next import of channels from Julian.
